participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Alex is always looking for new challenges and opportunities.
participant_1.background: i plan to go to business school next year. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i grew up in manhattan.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Resilient and optimistic, Emily inspires others with her positive outlook on life and her dedication to fitness.
participant_2.background: i'm a cancer survivor. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater. my parents were both very athletic.

content.text: i like to run . i like to run .
what do you do for a living ?
